TextLibrary.Text: Sunspear's Spirit
Sunspear, is that you?
Sunspear, is that you?
Sunspear, is that you?
Sunspear, is that you?
In a manner of speaking, yes it is.
In a manner of speaking, yes it is.
In a manner of speaking, yes it is.
In a manner of speaking, yes it is.
I can see right through you! You're not Undead are you?
I can see right through you! You're not Undead are you?
I can see right through you! You're not Undead are you?
I can see right through you! You're not Undead are you?
I am a spirit. There is a difference. I am not guided by the hand of evil.
I am a spirit. There is a difference. I am not guided by the hand of evil.
I am a spirit. There is a difference. I am not guided by the hand of evil.
I am a spirit. There is a difference. I am not guided by the hand of evil.
Did something go wrong?
Did something go wrong?
Did something go wrong?
Did something go wrong?
No, everything is as it should be. I have been sent back to guide you. Your work is not done yet. Where once I helped you fight Minotaurs, now I have a unique insight into how to fight the Undead.
No, everything is as it should be. I have been sent back to guide you. Your work is not done yet. Where once I helped you fight Minotaurs, now I have a unique insight into how to fight the Undead.
No, everything is as it should be. I have been sent back to guide you. Your work is not done yet. Where once I helped you fight Minotaurs, now I have a unique insight into how to fight the Undead.
No, everything is as it should be. I have been sent back to guide you. Your work is not done yet. Where once I helped you fight Minotaurs, now I have a unique insight into how to fight the Undead.
It's good to have you back, Sunspear.
It's good to have you back, Sunspear.
It's good to have you back, Sunspear.
It's good to have you back, Sunspear.
